(1) Tochi continues disturbed. Nadir Khan interviewing party of 200 Militia deserters at Matun on 5th July is reported to have urged them to continue to harass our posts and communications in Tochi, and to have hinted that he would be ready to advance in 10 days' time.(2) Kim Shah Kabul Khel Waziri from Binnal reported to have moved towards Wana with a small force.(3) Small tribal gang raided Malana, 7 miles south of Dera Ismail Khan, 7thJuly-(4) Situation on rest of border and in. Afghanistan unchanged.Part 2. Party of from 400 to 600 tribesmen, including deserters, reported east of Miranshah threatening Bannu road, our road pickets lost four "killed in reaching their position on 8th July.All communicated to Press.
